program: Master of Science in Computer Science (MS)

sections.text: The Columbia MS in Computer Science provides advanced training with the flexibility to specialize in subfields such as AI, systems, security, vision, and theory.

items: Breadth requirement across core CS areas
Specialization tracks (e.g., AI, ML, Systems, Security, Vision, NLP)
sections.text: Students meet breadth requirements and choose electives within a specialization track; some pursue a thesis under faculty supervision.

items: Relevant undergraduate background in CS or related field recommended
Completion of credit, breadth, and track requirements
sections.text: Admission favors strong CS preparation; degree completion follows SEAS credit and distribution policies.
Graduates pursue roles in software engineering, machine learning, data science, and research across industry and academia.
